entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
